meanings.definition: A type of medication used to treat acid reflux and stomach ulcers.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed omeprazoles for my stomach issues.
meanings.sent2: Many people find relief from heartburn by taking omeprazoles.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally mistook omeprazoles for candy and got a sour surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her daily dose of omeprazoles was like a shield against stomach acid attacks.
meanings.sent5: The bottle of omeprazoles on the shelf reminded me to take care of my health.

meanings.definition: The plural form of omeprazole, a proton pump inhibitor.
meanings.sent1: At the pharmacy, they were out of omeprazole, so I had to buy omeprazoles instead.
meanings.sent2: The doctor mentioned that omeprazoles are effective in reducing stomach acid.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally bought too many omeprazoles and now have a lifetime supply.
meanings.sent4: The omeprazoles in the cabinet stood like soldiers ready to battle heartburn.
meanings.sent5: The box of omeprazoles in the drawer was a reminder of the importance of digestive health.
